meanings.definition: To write or draw in the sky using smoke or an aircraft.
meanings.sent1: The pilot skywrote a heart in the sky for his girlfriend.
meanings.sent2: Yesterday, the plane skywrote a message for all to see.
meanings.sent3: The skywriting artist accidentally skywrote his grocery list instead of the advertisement.
meanings.sent4: The clouds seemed to skywrite a secret message only the birds could read.
meanings.sent5: Children gasped in amazement as the plane skywrote their names in the sky.
